title: tf.scatter_nd_update gradient support
body_html: It seems that tf.scatter_nd_update does not support gradient back-propagation. Then in essence, it would be really hard to benefit from it in real applications where one needs to connect different components and back-propagate the error. Is there any possibility to provide the gradient support ?
